experimental
Class ScanRecorder

java.lang.Object
  experimental.ScanRecorder

public class ScanRecorder
extends java.lang.Object

records the results of a 180 degree scan (angle and light intensity to a dataLogger and plays it back over a USB port

Author:
owner.GLASSEY
